website_summaries.verdict: Hoka One One Vanquish 3 ensures the optimal level of cushioning and support for runners during their run. It surprised its wearers with its excellent performance in different activities on the roads. Overall, the users seemed very happy with the shoe as it satisfied their daily needs very well.
pros: The majority of the customers were happy with the cushioning of the Hoka One One Vanquish 3
The runners were impressed with the snug fit because it prevented their feet from wobbling
Most users felt that the open construction of the upper unit kept their feet cool and dry
Many runners were satisfied with the performance of the shoe on long-distance runs
The Vanquish 3 surprised many of its wearers by its excellent grip on the asphalt
The shoe satisfied many runners with its general durability
A few of its users admired its good looks
The shoe felt lightweight despite its bulky appearance, some consumers reported
A customer suffering from Plantar Fasciitis felt relief in his steps while walking
he had the substantial midsole to thank for that
A customer was happy with the wide toe-box of the shoe because it provided enough room for his toes to splay
cons: A few customers were unhappy with the construction of the Vanquish 3
they said that the platform was less substantial and its form heavier than its predecessor
Some of the runners complained about the tightness of the shoe
According to a tester, the heel cup wasn’t as efficient as the one that’s present in the previous iteration

customer_reviews.title: I've had issues with plantar F and Achilles tendonitis. ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had issues with plantar F and Achilles tendonitis. I can wear these without pricey inserts so it's a win win.
customer_reviews.author: arctic poppy

customer_reviews.title: Just OK...
customer_reviews.text: I had over 500 mile on the Vanquish 2 (absolutely loved them). The Vanquish 3 didn't have as much cushioning as the the Vanquish 2. Also, I developed blisters on the side of my heals. I never had any blisters with the Vanquish 2. Will switch back to Vanquish 2.
customer_reviews.author: Armen

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality and no free returns. I didn’t realize I was buying from a 3rd party. Disappointed with seller and the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Lorieckl

customer_reviews.title: Hoka Vanquish!!
customer_reviews.text: Vanquish is the best running shoe I have worn. This is my 6th pair! I’m sad Hoka stopped making it. Thankful Amazon still has some of them.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I just had foot surgery and am transitioning from air boot to shoe. This shoe has all of the support I need and it’s like walking on clouds. Love love love them. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R Clayton

customer_reviews.title: The offset is perfect and the cushion feel is excellent
customer_reviews.text: The offset is perfect and the cushion feel is excellent, I will take them out for a run this weekend to see how it goes. So far, the quality of the shoes is good and I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: HouseofMoon

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits tighter and smaller than other hoka shoes I have owned. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: The best sneaker brand on the market.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sneaker brand on the market. They are like walking on air, terrific support. Have this sneaker in two other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Robear46

customer_reviews.title: Love the support!
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe! And very pretty. They fit as expected and have good support.
customer_reviews.author: dixiepeach

customer_reviews.title: Great for foot issues
customer_reviews.text: I have an issue with my toe and am very limited in my footwear. These are one of the very few shoes I can wear. They have a large toe box and supportive thick soles.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Pace

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strange but they don't seem as comfy as the first pair that I got.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of three

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I use 8.5 and my Sauconny fits perfectly; I bought Hoka at same number and fits well big that made several blister on my right feet; very disaponted
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Francisco Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: A tighter fit than expected. The shoe was flimsy. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever another planet compared to all other shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever another planet compared to all other shoes. If half of the Hawaii iron man or running with these you can understand they are special
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart too soon
customer_reviews.text: My disappointment is in the construction. I have had them just a month (only worn probably a total of 10 days) and the sole is alread separates from the upper shoe on both shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and the color is really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad, he loves it! Very light weight and the color is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mah Marino

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This was larger than the vanquish 2. I had to return them. Trying to figure out the fee I was charged for returning. Should've gone to the brick and mortar store!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa chickering

customer_reviews.title: Did not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: A most comfortable shoe and nice looking too! Love them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. So comfortable and would purchase again. Quality foot support. Excellent walking and running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. They were a gift. Recipient was very satisfied with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Weeble

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: The box was torn up which I could live with, but the bottom of the shoes were covered in black like they were worn and returned. Also, I wear 6 1/2 in ASICS and these were a lot bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. The shoe just feels more and hard then the usual cushy feel I expect from Hoka.
customer_reviews.author: Ida Mazzone

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, but the upper is not great quality and tore with time and use.
customer_reviews.author: José Rodolfo Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe! It is so comfortable. It’s my second pair of the Vanquish. It’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Moon

customer_reviews.title: Shoe fit
customer_reviews.text: Too tight through the top area. Need to make them wider.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Hoover

customer_reviews.title: I found the form of tennis bigger than I usually ...
customer_reviews.text: I found the form of tennis bigger than I usually use ... I use 8.5 and this model got much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Haddad Santini

customer_reviews.title: Toe box runs smaller than other Hoka sneakers. Had to return.
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of Hoka sneakers as this brand was recommended to me by my orthopedic surgeon after some leg surgery. I have been very happy with this brand. This was the fourth pair I have bought and it was not the same fit as the other three. It runs much more narrow in the toe box area. Just not comfortable. Had to return these but I really liked the style. But I buy these primarily for comfort, not style!
customer_reviews.author: Ladydianef

customer_reviews.title: men’s size delivered 🙄
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom after she sent me the link........ we got men’s size. Even though the listing is for women’s. She really likes the Hoka brand though; she’s had some issues with her feet, it’s a shame this listing is wrong.
customer_reviews.author: passionderanged

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes EVER
customer_reviews.text: Best Shoes EVER! I have severe plantar fasciitis and I got these shoes and feel like I am walking on clouds. They are on believable! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shari B.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I agree they not that good Made in Crappy Vietnam. Way over priced.
customer_reviews.author: O. shop

product_meta.title: HOKA ONE ONE womens 1014791 1014792 Btbp Blue Size: 5 UK
product_meta.description: Hoka Vanquish 3 Running Shoes The Vanquish 3 is made for the runner looking for a premium, springy, ride, that takes comfort and responsiveness to a new level. Built on a dual layer midsole from two EVA compounds, this light, super, cushioned and versatile shoe further refines the Vanquish 2 - Competitor Magazine Editor's Choice Award Winner. An updated asymmetrical external web gives zonal support, and improved breathability adds to the seamlessly constructed upper. Zonal 3D Puff Print Upper The upper of the Hoka Vanquish 3 Running Shoes is constructed with a Seamless Air Mesh which provides ventilation to the feet, keeping them feeling cool and dry. Additionally, the Zonal 3D Puff print also offers added breathability and support. Fitted with a Padded Tongue, the shoe offers comfort which reduces the risk of irritation and discomfort. The upper is also lined with an Ortholite sockliner which is an advanced proprietary polyurethane formula, with recycled rubber content, delivering a combination of benefits unmatched by any other insole manufacturer. Early-Stage Meta-Rocker Midsole Our Meta-Rocker midsole geometry is specifically designed with a low heel-toe differential and a sculptured outsole to create a unique fulcrum effect, like a rocking chair, to encourage a guided gait cycle. This design supports a runner's form while promoting an efficient, smooth roll from initial impact to toe-off. The Early-Stage Meta-Rocket is placed behind the metatarsal heads which help to create a smoother ride and a faster transition to the forefoot. The Vanquish 3 is fitted with a Suspension-Frame and a Dual Layered Midsole Construction which allows for a lightweight, super cushioned versatile shoe. The High Rebound Body EVA provides comfort and responsiveness while the High Cushion EVA Top Midsole provides additional comfort. Zonal Rubber Placement Outsole The outsole is made from a durable rubber which will keep the bottom of the shoe from wearing away easily. Zonal rubber has b
feature_bullets: 3D Puff Print Frame - Lightweight and offers a secure fit.
Air Mesh Upper - Allows air to permeate the exterior providing breathability.
Padded Tongue - Padding to help prevent chafe and discomfort.
Ortholite Insole - Provides additional cushioning for arch support and durable comfort.
Meta-Rocker - Helps for accurate roll through the gate cycle.
